001// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-or-later
002
003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.luceneindex;
004
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.nio.file.Path;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.util.Collection;
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.Map;
011import java.util.Set;
012
013import org.apache.lucene.analysis.core.WhitespaceAnalyzer;
014import org.apache.lucene.document.Field;
015import org.apache.lucene.document.FieldType;
016import org.apache.lucene.document.StoredField;
017import org.apache.lucene.index.IndexOptions;
018import org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriter;
019import org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriterConfig;
020import org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriterConfig.OpenMode;
021import org.apache.lucene.index.IndexableField;
022import org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.BM25Similarity;
023import org.apache.lucene.store.FSDirectory;
024
025import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.AbstractProcessingStep;
026import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.ProcessingException;
027import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.luceneindex.xml.definition.FolderPathProcessingStepParameter;
028
029/**
030 * Builds a Lucene index for all the input documents.
031 * <p>
032 * Example declaration for this step in a process definition file:
033 * </p>
034 * <pre>
035 * {@code <step action="LuceneIndex">
036 *      <parameters>
037 *              <textDocumentWithTitleTableName>non_empty_submission</textDocumentWithTitleTableName>
038 *              <textDocumentTableName>non_empty_comment</textDocumentTableName>
039 *              <li:folderPath>my_index</li:folderPath>
040 *      </parameters>
041 * </step>}
042 * </pre>
043 *
044 * @author Alejandro González García
045 */
046final class LuceneIndexProcessingStep extends AbstractProcessingStep {
047        private static final String FOLDER_PATH_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME = new FolderPathProcessingStepParameter().getName();
048
049        /**
050         * Instantiates a Lucene index building processing step.
051         */
052        LuceneIndexProcessingStep() {
053                super(
054                        // Additional mandatory and optional parameters, with their validation function
055                        Map.of(
056                                FOLDER_PATH_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME, (final String value) -> value != null && !value.isBlank()
057                        ),
058                        // Additional mandatory parameters
059                        Set.of()
060                );
061        }
062
063        @Override
064        protected void run() throws ProcessingException {
065                try {
066                        final FSDirectory indexFolder = FSDirectory.open(Path.of(
067                                getParameters().getOrDefault(FOLDER_PATH_PROCESSING_STEP_PARAMETER_NAME, "lucene_index")
068                        ));
069
070                        // Use a simple whitespace analyzer and tokenizer because input documents are assumed to be processed.
071                        // BM25 is a state of the art TF-IDF-based similarity metric
072                        final IndexWriterConfig indexConfig = new IndexWriterConfig(new WhitespaceAnalyzer())
073                                .setOpenMode(OpenMode.CREATE)
074                                .setSimilarity(new BM25Similarity());
075
076                        // The field type for every document text attribute
077                        final FieldType fieldType = new FieldType();
078                        fieldType.setStored(false); // Do not store the raw value. We store a key instead
079                        fieldType.setIndexOptions(IndexOptions.DOCS_AND_FREQS_AND_POSITIONS);
080                        fieldType.setStoreTermVectors(true);
081                        fieldType.setStoreTermVectorPositions(true);
082                        fieldType.freeze();
083
084                        try (final IndexWriter luceneIndex = new IndexWriter(indexFolder, indexConfig)) {
085                                for (int i = 0; i < unprocessedDocumentTypesNames.size(); ++i) {
086                                        final String[] unprocessedAttributeNames = unprocessedDocumentsAttributes.get(i);
087
088                                        forEachDocumentInNativeQuery(
089                                                unprocessedDocumentsQuerySuppliers.get(i),
090                                                String.format("Adding %s to Lucene index", unprocessedDocumentTypesNames.get(i)),
091                                                numberOfUnprocessedEntitiesProviders.get(i).get(),
092                                                (final List<String[]> batchAttributes) -> {
093                                                        final Collection<IndexableField> documentFields = new ArrayList<>(unprocessedAttributeNames.length);
094
095                                                        for (final String[] documentAttributes : batchAttributes) {
096                                                                // Add a field with the primary key
097                                                                documentFields.add(
098                                                                        new StoredField("id", Integer.parseInt(documentAttributes[0]))
099                                                                );
100
101                                                                // Add the text attributes of the document as fields
102                                                                for (int j = 0; j < unprocessedAttributeNames.length; ++j) {
103                                                                        documentFields.add(
104                                                                                new Field(unprocessedAttributeNames[0], documentAttributes[j + 1], fieldType)
105                                                                        );
106                                                                }
107
108                                                                try {
109                                                                        luceneIndex.addDocument(documentFields);
110                                                                } catch (final IllegalArgumentException | IOException exc) {
111                                                                        throw new ProcessingException(DATA_ACCESS_EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, exc);
112                                                                }
113
114                                                                // Clear the collection for reuse
115                                                                documentFields.clear();
116                                                        }
117                                                },
118                                                null
119                                        );
120                                }
121
122                                luceneIndex.commit();
123                        }
124                } catch (final IllegalArgumentException | IOException exc) {
125                        throw new ProcessingException(DATA_ACCESS_EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, exc);
126                }
127        }
128}
